name: antsct-fw
label: ANTs Cortical Thickness
author: Nicholas J. Tustison, Brian B. Avants, Philip A. Cook, Gang Song, Sandhitsu Das, Niels van Strien, James R. Stone, James C. Gee
cite: Tustison, Nicholas & Avants, Brian & Cook, Philip & Song, Gang & Das, Sandhitsu & van Strien, Niels & Stone, James & Gee, James. (2013). The ANTs cortical thickness processing pipeline. Progress in Biomedical Optics and Imaging - Proceedings of SPIE. 8672. 86720K. 10.1117/12.2007128.

output-file-root.description: Prepended onto output files. A sensible value of this would be '${subject}_${session}_'.

num-threads.description: Maximum number of CPU threads to use. Set to 0 to use as many threads as there are cores

denoise.description: Run denoising within the ACT pipeline (default = true).

run-quick.description: true to use quick registration, 0 to use the default (default = false)

trim-neck.description: 'true' to run the trim_neck.sh script, 'false' to use the raw data (default = true)
